name: Space Breakers (SilverTeeShirt)
description:
Space Breakers is a Point and Click Visual Novel game made in the ren'py engine. Hop aboard the Rusty Clover as it travels the galaxy in search of potential riches and mystery! 

Be part of a colorful cast of misfit aliens as you search through a derelict space station.

This is game was made for the Nanoreno 2023 GameJam and produced in about 1 month.

• Point and click style exploration

• Mystery with lighthearted dialogue

• Game is unfinished SORRY! We will still be working on the game after release

TEAM:

SilverTeeShirt : Team lead, bg artist, writer, scripter, audio designer

MiniPaquin: Musician, audio designer

LLP: Systems Coder

GreenClovers: Writer

Elina: Character Artist
